ygData.subject: Magmatron to Halucigen
ygData.msgSnippet: The Drone: The drone went inside the Deathcon and found both bots, Spy Streak and Halucigen. He scanned them both. One was Destron (Spy Streak) and the other

Subject: Magmatron to Halucigen
To: Nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
From: James T <t882hcc91@...>

The Drone:

     The drone went inside the Deathcon and found both
bots, Spy Streak and Halucigen. He scanned them both.
One was Destron (Spy Streak) and the other was not
(Halucigen). He was emmiting a constant feedback to
Magmatron, Magmatron only had a five second delay
between what the drone saw and when it got to
Magmatron.

Magmatron:

     "Hmmmm...Interesting," Magmatron said. "It seems
that Spy Streak has made it here after all, well,
good. I could use all the troops I can find. I wonder
if anymore of my minions will be joining me."

Magmatron Speaking Through Drone:

     The drone's optics darkened for a second. Then
when they did return they glowed with green instead of
yellow. Magmatron spoke through his Drone, he would
have to make it quick, as he had another Transformer
to meet. "Greetings my fellow Transformer." He said to
Halucigen. "I am pleased that you had found my
secondary base, it gives me the opportunity to
communicate with you before the other dispicable
factions rip you apart of scrap. I do hope you will
listen to what I have to say.
     "Allow me to introduce myself, I am Magmatron,
leader of the Destrons. You have already met Spy
Streak, please do stand down Spy Streak [Spy Streak
lowered his weapons, but still glares at Halucigen],
thank you. 
     "As I was saying, I do hope you will come and
meet me in person, I would love to eet you. I have a
few escourts to bring you to my primary base, if you
will allow that of course. Why don't you stay right
here with me until they arrive?" He was emmiting the
location of the drone to the Destrocons, they should
be able to find him easily. MagmatronDrone flew up to
a computer terminal and linked up with it. On all the
screens of the hallway appeared Magmatron's face, then
he spoke again. "Why don't you, Spy Streak, go to the
coordinates of the other Drone, you are needed there.
[Spy Streak transformes and flys off towards Europe]
Please, at least give me the coursicy of you name."
